answerText: Observatory [accept other forms; prompt on answers mentioning buildings with telescopes][10] The event that created this heavenly body in 1054 was independently observed by Arabian and Chinese astronomers. Charles Messier confused this body with Halley's Comet, so he compiled his namesake catalogue.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 12 | 17 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Taqi al-Din was a facility of this type in Istanbul that burned down and one named for Ulugh Beg stood at Samarkand. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of scientific facility also exemplified by a Royal Greenwich one. A more modern one has the Sub-Millimeter Array at the summit of Mauna Kea.
